title: The Art Institute of Chicago Announces New Catering Partnerships
copy: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE October 7, 2022   Chicago— The Art Institute of Chicago is thrilled to announce that external events will resume at the museum in January 2023 and that it has awarded Chicago catering firms Blue Plate Catering, Food for Thought, Limelight Catering and Paramount Events to serve as the museum’s exclusively approved caterers. Each of these catering firms will support museum initiatives and elevate a culture of hospitality by providing the highest quality service for both internal and external clients. The Art Institute looks forward to continuing the tradition of being one of Chicago’s premier venues with our new catering partners. Since its founding in 1879, the Art Institute has played a key role in Chicago as a space of cultural and civic exchange. Featuring an acclaimed collection of artwork from around the world and drawing an average of 1.5 million visitors annually, the Art Institute is a renowned venue for weddings, corporate events, and non-profit events and hosts approximately 200 external events annually across its 15 event spaces. Event inquiries can be sent to eventrentals@artic.edu.
